Name: Pot Farmer
About the game: Pot Farmer is a simple 2D pixel art farming game. Pot Farmer introduces a classic form of farming style game-play. With a clicker-like mentality. In pot farmer you will plant pot, upgrade pot, and ultimately become the pot. Any true pot farmer knows that this is game of the year material. Pot Farmer won't just let you plant pot and upgrade pots. No, you will also have a variety of pot plants to upgrade to. Make more money using your pot growing powers. The more money you have the higher the leaderboard score you can upload to show you are the highest of all pot farmers. Key Features: 1. Unlock plots to grow new plants 2. Unlock various plant types 3. Steam Achievements and Stats 4. Steam Leaderboards 5. Consistent updates and bug patches
